means: 爱因斯坦的，爱因斯坦理论的

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to Albert Einstein or his theories;

auth_sentence.content: Whereas I, being post-Einsteinian, believe that there is a "standard model" that applies to everything including reason.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whereas I, being post-Einsteinian, believe that there is a "standard model" that applies to everything including reason.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whereas I, being post-Einsteinian, believe that there is a "standard model" that applies to everything including reason.

auth_sentence.content: In an Einsteinian spacetime there are no such 'THING's as 'time' or 'gravity.
auth_sentence.res_content: In an Einsteinian spacetime there are no such 'THING's as 'time' or 'gravity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In an Einsteinian spacetime there are no such 'THING's as 'time' or 'gravity.

auth_sentence.content: It is the paradigm of Newtonian thinking being applied to an Einsteinian reality of quanta.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is the paradigm of Newtonian thinking being applied to an Einsteinian reality of quanta.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is the paradigm of Newtonian thinking being applied to an Einsteinian reality of quanta.
